post_detail.description: When Showtime needed a VFX team to create elements for an episode of Nurse Jackie, they turned directly to Click3X. In this clip, we composited the green screen bird, created a CGI gargoyle, and shot elements of the city, then packaged them together seamlessly to create the scene.
post_detail.title: Nurse Jackie

assets.description: When Showtime needed a VFX team to create elements for an episode of Nurse Jackie, they turned directly to Click3X. In this clip, we composited the green screen bird, created a CGI gargoyle, and shot elements of the city, then packaged them together seamlessly to create the scene.
